listData.name: Business Essentials Term Loan Special Offer
listData.description: Loan finance up to and including $5 million to support small business expansion, capital purchases and more.

features.additionalInfo: Fixed & variable rate options

Reduce your interest repayments with our offset feature (variable only). The funds in your linked Suncorp Bank business transaction account will offset the balance of your Small Business Essentials Loan.
Manage your cash flow with our Cashback feature, enabling you to access any extra money you've paid into your loan (variable only)
Split your loan across fixed and variable rates. You can choose to split your loan and fix a portion of your borrowings at a fixed interest rate for greater budgeting certainty.
Flexible security options – residential, commercial/industrial or a mix of these options
Principal and Interest (P&I) or Interest-only (IO) repayment options
Choose weekly, fortnightly, or monthly repayments
Choose to pay more than your required minimum monthly repayment (variable only)
Make additional repayments or lump sum payments (variable only)
May form part of a Business Ready Package depending on eligibility criteria.

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must be a registered Australian business with a current ABN or ACN.
You need to have security such as residential property, commercial or industrial property, or a combination of these.
You will also need to provide a completed application with supporting documentation including 2 most recent consecutive years of financial information.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: New term loans between $20,000 and $999,999

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: New term loans between $1,000,000 and $5,000,000

fees.name: Property Evaluation Fee - Commercial Security /Commercial Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Determined by a Valuer at the time of the loan application.This fee is payable at the time of application and is non-refundable

fees.name: Property Evaluation Fee – Residential Security / Residential Property Valuation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Determined by a Valuer at the time of the loan application and payable at loan settlement. It will be notified to you in your Credit Contract as a combined total with any applicable Commercial Property Valuation Fee. This fee is payable for each valuation assessment of the loan security  obtained by us under the loan application

fees.name: Guaranteed Rate Fee
fees.additionalInfo: A Guaranteed Rate Fee secures a fixed rate for 90 days following your application. This fee is non refundable. Only applies to new 1, 2, 3, 4 and 5 year fixed rate term loans. If applicable, the higher of $600 or 0.15% of the amount  borrowed (excluding other fees which are financed by the loan)

fees.name: Progressive Funding Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Determined at Application. Variable Rate only. Applies at loan settlement or first draw (at the Bank’s discretion) for any part of the loan provided  for construction purposes.

fees.name: Cashback Fee
fees.additionalInfo: Variable Rate only. No charge applies for the first Cashback transaction per calendar month. Cashback fee may be charged and rebated. A fee for each Cashback withdrawal applies. Minimum withdrawal amount is  $1000.

lendingRates.additionalInfo: New Lending. Residential Security; Add 0.50% p.a. margin for commercial security.
New Lending. Residential Security; Add 0.50% p.a. margin for commercial security.

listData.name: Bank Guarantee for Businesses
listData.description: A written commitment issued on your behalf in favour of a third party to undertake to pay on demand the amount specified in the guarantee to meet your obligations under a contract signed between yourself and a third party.

features.additionalInfo: Free up working capital by providing a Suncorp Bank Guarantee.
When you are looking to purchase or build a property, a Suncorp Bank Guarantee can be issued to the vendor or building contractor in place of a cash deposit.
A Bank Guarantee can be issued to the landlord or real-estate agent as a bond for security against items like damage or unpaid rent.
They can be used as Maintenance/Retention Bonds - e.g. builder’s post-completion obligations during a warranty period
They can act as Performance bonds e.g. in favour of a Local council/ Government Department for minor construction/ development projects
Security type: term deposit or a property mortgage with Suncorp Bank
Term: Any term you choose or no fixed term (ongoing)

constraints.additionalInfo: For Bank guarantees secured by Term deposit

eligibility.additionalInfo: You must have a term deposit or an existing Suncorp Bank property mortgage that can be offered as security for your Bank Guarantee.
You will need to provide a completed application with supporting documentation relevant to the bank guarantee purpose.

fees.name: Establishment Fee
fees.additionalInfo: 0.50% of the Bank Guarantee amount or approved facility limit (minimum $100). Where security is required additional fees may be applicable, such as, valuation, documentation settlement, and search fees. These may differ for each application and all fees will be advised in writing on approval.

fees.name: Ongoing service fee
fees.additionalInfo: 1.5% (rounded to the nearest dollar) payable per half year in advance. Minimum of $150 per half year.

fees.name: Variation Fee
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged at the time the Bank Guarantee is varied on customer request. This occurs when there is a change to the favouree details and/or when the amount of the Term Deposit that secures the Bank Guarantee is reduced or we otherwise agree to change the Bank Guarantee.

fees.name: Cancellation Fee (each)
fees.additionalInfo: This fee is charged at the time the Bank Guarantee is returned to the Bank and cancelled.

fees.additionalInfo: Term Deposits only
